channel.title: Commands

item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

First to make a void you add it under.

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {
Then you must add the void, here is a basic one.

public void commands() { sendQuest("@bla@. **- Commands -**", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@bla@W/E", 8147); sendQuest("@bla@W/E", 8148); sendQuest("@bla@W/E", 8149); sendQuest("@bla@W/E", 8150); sendQuest("@bla@W/E", 8151); sendQuest("@bla@W/E", 8152); sendQuest("@bla@W/E", 8153); sendQuest("@bla@W/E", 8154); sendQuest("@bla@W/E", 8155); sendQuest("@bla@W/E", 8156); sendQuest(" @bla@W/E", 8157); sendQuest("@bla@W/E", 8158); sendQuest("@bla@W/E", 8159); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }
Then you need to make sure you get no errors from adding it, then you need to make a command.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("rules") && (playerRights >= 0)) { commands(); sM("Awesome aren't they?"); }
And that is that.

Read full topic
